title: UK CPI microdata extract — uk_cpi
text: subset official UK CIP microdata set

title: UK CPI microdata extract — uk_cpi
text: data frame 6,845 rows 14 columns: Year Year COICOP5 COICOP 5-digit code Product code Product code

title: UK CPI microdata extract — uk_cpi
text: https://www..int/teams/global-tuberculosis-programme/data

title: Calculate PPP-ratio tables — valid_PPPratio
text: valid_PPPratio Calculates PPP-ratio, shows variation coefficient representing variability across products across countries.

title: Calculate PPP-ratio tables — valid_PPPratio
code: valid_PPPratio(   df,   Year = "Year",   `Product code` = "Product code",   Country = "Country",   `Average price of product` = "Average price of product" )

title: Calculate PPP-ratio tables — valid_PPPratio
text: Year add `Product code` add `Average price product` add `XR USD` add

title: Calculate PPP-ratio tables — valid_PPPratio
text: (country) variation coefficient row measures standard deviation product PPPs country, thereby highlighting countries highest variability. (product) variation coefficient column measures standard deviation among PPP ratios product.

title: Calculate XR-ratio tables — valid_XRratio
text: valid_XRratio Calculates XR-ratio, region/country's XR-price product divided geometric mean product price. Variability can compared highlight products countries/regions variable (high XR-ratio) across countries.

title: Calculate XR-ratio tables — valid_XRratio
code: valid_XRratio(   df,   Year = "Year",   `Product code` = "Product code",   `Average price of product` = "Average price of product",   `XR USD` = "XR USD" )

title: Calculate XR-ratio tables — valid_XRratio
text: Year add `Product code` add `Average price product` add `XR USD` add

title: Create Average Price Table — valid_apt
text: valid_apt Creates Average Price Table used Stage 2 intra-regional validation process. returns tibble input parameters (variables), well Number observations, Average price product, Maximum price product, Minimum price product, Standard deviation. furthermore provides Max-min ratio Coefficient variation statistics. products pass two tests flagged columns

title: Create Average Price Table — valid_apt
code: valid_apt(   df,   Year = "Year",   `Product code` = "Product code",   `Product description` = "Product description",   `Reference quantity` = "Reference quantity",   `Unit of reference quantity` = "Unit of reference quantity",   `Reference quantity price` = "Reference quantity price" )

title: Create Average Price Table — valid_apt
text: Year add `Product description` add `Unit reference quantity` add `Reference quantity price` add

title: Create Average Price Table — valid_apt
text: Max-min ratio FLAG Coefficient variation FLAG, respectively. TODO add description

title: Create Price Observation Table — valid_pot
text: valid_pot Creates Price Observation Table used Stage 1 intra-regional validation process. returns tibble input parameters (variables), well Ratio--average price test T-value test. price quotes pass two tests flagged columns Ratio--average price test FLAG T-value test FLAG, respectively. TODO add description

title: Create Price Observation Table — valid_pot
code: valid_pot(   df,   Year = "Year",   `Product code` = "Product code",   `Product description` = "Product description",   `Reference quantity` = "Reference quantity",   `Unit of reference quantity` = "Unit of reference quantity",   `Date of quote` = "Date of quote",   Region = "Region",   `Shop identifier` = "Shop identifier",   `Type of shop` = "Type of shop",   `Quantity observed` = "Quantity observed",   `Unit of observed quantity` = "Unit of observed quantity",   `Price observed` = "Price observed",   `Reference quantity price` = "Reference quantity price" )

title: Create Price Observation Table — valid_pot
text: Year add `Product description` add `Date quote` add `Region` add `Shop identifier` add `Type shop` add `Quantity observed` add `Unit observed quantity` add `Price observed` add `Reference quantity price` add
